summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5058 lux), cloud levels (up 582 m), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1512 m), light levels (up 7341 lux), and rainfall (down 0.4 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 582.5m lower than yesterday, 1069.3m lower than past week, 1511.8m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1290.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2360m and 2800m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, very clammy and humid. Possible light showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
